class_notes: This course focuses on how to align employee decision-making with organizational objectives, highlighting various forms of compensation and management control systems that rely on accounting and performance measurement information (i.e., internal information). This course will help students translate organizational objectives into action through the design of effective performance measurement techniques, performance-based compensation schemes, and other management control mechanisms.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the Evening MBA program.
